summary: Build a production-ready mobile/web app combining ZEGOCLOUD live streaming (live rooms with host/guest, backend token generation, camera/mic streaming, remote user display, proper leave/cleanup) plus social features like dating, direct chat, and group chat similar to apps like Helo/Yo.
architectural_notes: Use ZEGOCLOUD live streaming with AppID 769939428; generate tokens on a backend service before joining rooms (do not embed server secret in frontend for production).

existing_features.title: Add frontend pages and routing for Group Chat: a group discovery/list page, a group creation flow, and a group chat room page with message timeline and composer (Helo/Yo-like group feed experience).
Create React Query hooks for Group Chat operations (list groups, get group, membership actions, send/fetch messages) and integrate them with the existing authenticated actor pattern.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement ZEGOCLOUD live room system (host creates room, join via AppID 769939428, enable camera/mic, real-time streaming, show remote users, handle leave/cleanup)
Add backend API to generate ZEGOCLOUD tokens before users join rooms (production-safe token generation)
Add dating feature/module (profiles + matching flow) integrated with the app
Add group chat feature similar to Helo/Yo-style group chat experience

Implement a persistent Group Chat domain in the Motoko backend that supports creating groups, listing groups, viewing a group, joining/leaving a group, and posting/reading group messages (separate from the existing per-room chat).
